resources.string:
This App needs api 28 or higher.
It supports three languages: Chinese, English and German, and will automatically switch according to the language of the system. 
It can also automatically switch between light and dark modes according to the system theme.
The production of the app is entirely for
learning purposes, if there is any infringement,
please inform.

As in normal tic-tac-toe, in order to win, you must occupy three consecutive squares in the same row, column or diagonal.
The difference is that players will fight with numbers 0~8, and the larger number can occupy the square where the opponent's smaller number is located.
When both sides have no remaining numbers but no winner has been decided, the game will not draw directly, but will sum the numbers in the grid, and the sum is smaller The player with will win.
Players cannot reoccupy a square already occupied by themselves, nor can they use numbers that have already been used. In the game, the player first selects the number to be used by "selecting number", and then clicks on the square to be occupied. Click "restart" to start a new round. In pve mode, the game will randomly designate the first player.
